loose verb [T]
(SPEAK/EXPRESS EMOTIONS)
to speak or express emotions very freely, especially in an uncontrolled way: The coach loosed an angry tirade against his team. He loosed his frustration in a torrent of abuse.

loose verb [T]
(FIRE WEAPON)
